item.description: Topics Programming | Online privacy | Self hosting | Software Web | Linux | Minimalism | Guides | CLI | Philosophy April April 12, 2024 - How to set up mpd with mpc and ncmpcpp March March 20, 2024 - Contributing to open source projects with git March 2, 2024 - (Almost) Everyone should have their own website February February 28, 2024 - Set up your website on the tor network February 19, 2024 - How to generate a customized .
